assistant Professor of Studio Art Logan Grider spent much of his sabbatical on an Irish beach at low tide digging up plastic PERIOD He and his two young sons would carry bags of refuse  broken bottles torn childrens Wellingtons fragments of fishing

Swarthmore like many liberal arts colleges aims for a collaborative environment PERIOD The entire campus is multifunctional many buildings house multiple departments and plenty of academic classrooms convert into social spaces on weekends PERIOD The result is a more connected college community designed to
